channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump demands death penalty for Charlotte stabbing suspect
item.description: President Trump on Wednesday demanded the North Carolina man accused of murdering a Ukrainian refugee on a Charlotte train be put to death after a "Qu...

item.title: In new book, Harris laments "recklessness" that led to Biden's 2024 campaign
item.description: Former Vice President Kamala Harris blamed "recklessness" for former President Biden 's 2024 presidential bid, according to an excerpt published Wedne...

item.title: Oracle Chairman Larry Ellison on track to make $88 billion today, crushing records
item.description: There's rich, there's very rich, there's incomprehensibly rich, and then there's the day Oracle Chairman Larry Ellison is poised to have. The big pict...

item.title: Poland, NATO leaders condemn Russian drones in Polish airspace
item.description: Poland's armed forces shot down Russian drones that "repeatedly" violated the NATO member's airspace as Putin's forces attacked Ukraine, per Polish mi...

item.title: Harris says it was ‘recklessness’ to defer to Bidens on reelection decision
item.description: In her forthcoming memoir, Harris also writes about not feeling supported by Biden’s staff, who she said “rarely” defended her.

item.title: Democrats fight over how to defeat Republican Sen. Susan Collins
item.description: The emerging Democratic primary for the U.S. Senate in Maine embodies a stark choice in a party trying to remake itself.

item.title: Exclusive: U.S. should take a chunk of universities' patent revenue, Lutnick says
item.description: After taking a stake in Intel and a cut of Nvidia's chip sales in China, the U.S. government may next target a share of the money generated by patents...

item.title: Play mini golf to see how politicians tilt elections using maps
item.description: Can you beat par in our Gerrymander Invitational?

item.description: While it is not unusual for presidents to speak out about high-profile killings, they typically do not publicly urge prosecutors to pursue a certain p...

item.title: Trump blames Democrats for Charlotte stabbing. Records complicate the story.
item.description: The case has sharpened partisan divisions about an intractable root of crime: how to treat the seriously mentally ill who pose risks of violence.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
